lead_paragraph: Two half brothers will receive more than $1 million from the state of North Carolina after they were wrongfully imprisoned for three decades in the killing of an 11-year-old girl.

headline.main: 2 North Carolina Men Given Pardons in Girl’s 1983 Killing
headline.print_headline: 2 North Carolina Men Given Pardons in Girl’s 1983 Killing

snippet: Two half brothers will receive more than $1 million from the state of North Carolina after they were wrongfully imprisoned for three decades in the killing of an 11-year-old girl.
